attributes.action: Cancel/ Reschedule Summer Exams (A-Levels,GCSEs) Due To Health and Social Stress
attributes.additional_details: I would like Parliament to act fast to save the nations future because it would be the only way to get through to department of education. As an aspiring dentistry student I am surrounded by all other hard working students who realise that with the nearing of exams come increased deaths as a result of the coronavirus and it is scary! How are we expected to preform at our best in such extremely devastating situations? Exams such as A-levels are most vital as our future depends on them! HELP US!
attributes.background: Exams bring a lot of stress with them! With the recent threat of coronavirus, statistics for anxiety and depression are bound to increase. As a result I request due to the recent pandemic exams be cancelled/ rescheduled as it has created a demoralising society in which students struggle to survive!

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
